name: ride-pager
effect: Allows the player to summon a Ride Pokémon. Unused, as this can be done simply by pressing Y.
short_effect: Allows the player to summon a Ride Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: By entering certain numbers on this pager, you can summon Ride Pokémon in an instant.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: By entering certain numbers on this pager, you can summon Ride Pokémon in an instant.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: By entering certain numbers on this pager, you can summon Ride Pokémon in an instant.
